entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
